name: Find the Ball FREE
description:
"Find the Ball FREE" is a good skill game and very entertaining for family and all ages. Playing "Find the Ball FREE" will test and improve your attention and memory everyday. Blue ball is hiding under these three cups and you are required to find it. Are you up to the challenge? Just follow the easy steps to play the game.

Gameplay Instruction:
1. To start, the game will show you which cup has one blue ball.
2. Then they will shuffle the cups. Keep your eyes and focusing on the correct cup.
3. When the game stops shuffling, make your guess and pick the right cup.

If you find out the correct cup, then you will go to the next level. If not, the game is over.

Good Luck!
